summary: The DEFIANCE Act of 2025 aims to address the harms caused by non-consensual intimate digital forgeries (deepfakes). It amends the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2022 to provide civil remedies for individuals whose intimate visual depictions are disclosed without consent, including those involving digital forgeries. The bill defines "intimate digital forgery," outlines actions for civil suits, specifies relief (damages, injunctions), and includes provisions for privacy protection, statutes of limitations, and the continued applicability of existing laws. It focuses on interstate or foreign commerce implications for enforcement.
